scripts.test-summary: npm run _test-cover && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remaped-summary.txt -e \src\ -t text-summary && type coverage\coverage-remaped-summary.txt
scripts.test-detail: npm run _test-cover && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remaped.txt -e \src\ -t text && type coverage\coverage-remaped.txt
scripts.test-report: npm run _test-cover && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/lcov-report-remapped -e \src\ -t html && start coverage/lcov-report-remapped/index.html
